sentence.idiomatic: Who is the mysterious character you're talking about?
Hurry up and tell me. Quit being so mysterious.
There are a few mysterious phenomena that scientist have yet to figure out.
Shanghai is an immigrant city.
How is the American immigration policy of late?
Next year my family is going to immigrate to Canada.
Right now everyone exchange their ideas.
It's almost graduation, and everyone is busy exchanging mementos.
For the next game, are the two teams switching fields?
The athletes need to adapt to this environment.
I am not used to the weather in Shanghai.
Are you used to life here?
You should have more contact with some Western culture.
I have come into contact with some foreigners, and they were all nice.
Do you like encountering new things?
If an opportunity arises, you must grab hold of it.
If there's a chance for it, I would like to take you out to eat.
Do you have an opportunity to go to the US to study?
Wenwen, I want to talk to you about something.
What are you being so mysterious about?
I am going to Canada to study.
Huh? Your family is immigrating?
No, I'm going by myself. I'm doing an exchange program at a high school in Vancouver.
Really? Thats great! When are you going?
The beginning of next year.
That soon? Going by yourself to such a distant place, are you scared?
A little. But there are a lot of Chinese people there, I should be able to adapt very quickly.
Right. How long will you go for? Will you go to university there?
I'll go for one year. I'll have to see about university, I might go there.
Oh. Going overseas you can experience a lot of new things, it will be really good.
Yeah. I think this will be a great experience as well.
Don't forget about me.
I won't.
